trans-unit.source: The IAuthorizeRemotingConnection interface provides methods that indicate whether a client is authorized to connect on the current channel, based on the client's network address and user identity.
trans-unit.target: A interface IAuthorizeRemotingConnection fornece métodos que indicam se um cliente está autorizado para se ligar no canal atual, com base na identidade de utilizador e de endereços da rede do cliente.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the IAuthorizeRemotingConnection interface is passed to <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância da IAuthorizeRemotingConnection interface é passada para <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>

trans-unit.source: It provides a single point of authorization for all incoming connections on a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um ponto único de autorização para todas as ligações recebidas em <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>

trans-unit.source: It allows for the authorization of the caller before any incoming messages are deserialized to minimize the security threat from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: Permite a autorização do chamador antes de quaisquer mensagens de entrada são serialização anuladas para minimizar a ameaça de segurança de fontes não fidedignas.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the network address of the client is authorized to connect on the current channel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booleano que indica se o endereço de rede do cliente está autorizado para se ligar no canal atual.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface is passed to <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection>interface é passada para <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection>

trans-unit.source: It provides a single point of authorization for all incoming connections on a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um ponto único de autorização para todas as ligações recebidas em <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>

trans-unit.source: It allows for the authorization of the caller before any incoming messages are deserialized to minimize the security threat from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: Permite a autorização do chamador antes de quaisquer mensagens de entrada são serialização anuladas para minimizar a ameaça de segurança de fontes não fidedignas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.EndPoint> that identifies the network address of the client.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.EndPoint>que identifica o endereço de rede do cliente.</xref:System.Net.EndPoint>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the network address of the client is authorized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o endereço de rede do cliente está autorizado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the user identity of the client is authorized to connect on the current channel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booleano que indica se a identidade do utilizador do cliente está autorizada para se ligar no canal atual.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface is passed to <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection>interface é passada para <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection>

trans-unit.source: It provides a single point of authorization for all incoming connections on a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um ponto único de autorização para todas as ligações recebidas em <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>

trans-unit.source: It allows for the authorization of the caller before any incoming messages are deserialized to minimize the security threat from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: Permite a autorização do chamador antes de quaisquer mensagens de entrada são serialização anuladas para minimizar a ameaça de segurança de fontes não fidedignas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity> that represents the user identity of the client.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>que representa a identidade do utilizador do cliente.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user identity of the client is authorized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se está autorizada a identidade do utilizador do cliente; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
